src:
“Qarshi neft bazasi”da sifati buzilgan 514,6 mln so‘mlik neft mahsulotlari aniqlandi

06 Nov 2019, 11:09

Joriy yilning oktabr oyida “O‘zneftgazinspeksiya” mutaxassislari tomonidan “Qarshi neft bazasi” jamiyati va unga qarashli filiallarda tekshiruv o‘tkazildi. Bu haqda “O‘zneftegazinspeksiya” axborot xizmati xabar berdi.


Foto: “O‘zneftegazinspeksiya” axborot xizmati

“Qarshi neft bazasi” va unga qarashli filiallarda neft mahsulotlari sig‘imlaridagi mahsulotning haqiqiy qoldig‘i bilan hisobxona qoldig‘i taqqoslanganda hamda sifat tahlili uchun namunalar olinganda jami 11 milliard 535 million so‘mlik manbalar aniqlangan.
Jumladan, 220,3 million so‘mlik 38,4 tonna kamomad, 50,9 million so‘mlik 5,7 tonna ortiqchalik, 160,1 million so‘mlik 26,4 tonna asossiz hisobdan chiqarish, 514,6 million so‘mlik 97 703 litr mahsulot sifati buzilganligi hamda 7 milliard 512 million so‘mlik 3850 tonna neft mahsulotlarni “O‘zbekneftegaz” AJ ruxsatisiz AYoQShlarga imtiyozli narxlarda tarqtish holatlari aniqlandi.
Bundan tashqari, jamiyatga qarashli sig‘imlarda saqlanayotgan sig‘imlardan neft mahsulotlarning sifatini aniqlash uchun namunalar olinib “O‘zneftegazinspeksiya”ning Toshkent nazorat-kimyo laboratoriyasiga topshirilgan. Sifat tahlili natijasida jami 514,6 million so‘mlik 97 703 litr neft mahsulotlari sifati buzilganligi aniqlandi.
Mavzuga doir: “O‘zneftgazinspeksiya” tabiiy va suyultirilgan gazning 5 mlrd so‘mga yaqin miqdorda o‘g‘irlanish holatini aniqladi
Nazorat va tahlil natijalari bo‘yicha rasmiylashtirilgan hujjatlar huquqni muhofaza qilish organlariga taqdim etilgan.
text:
Karshi Oil Base detected 514.6 million soums worth of oil products

06 Nov 2019, 11:09 AM

In October of this year, specialists of “Uzneftgazinspekseksiya” conducted an inspection of the Karshi Oil Base Society and its affiliates. About it reports "Uzneftegazinspeksiya".


Photo: "Uzneftegazinspeksiya" information service

When comparing the actual balance of the oil products capacity and the balance of the accounts in the Karshi oil base and its affiliates and sampling for the analysis, a total of 11 billion 535 million sources were identified.
Including a deficit of 38.4 tons for 220.3 million soums, an increase of 5.7 tons for 50.9 million soums, unjustified write-off of 26.4 tons for 160.1 million soums and 514.6 million soums. There were revealed violations of 97 703 liters of product quality and 3850 tonnes of oil products worth 7 billion 512 million soums at the preferential prices without permission of Uzbekneftegaz.
In addition, samples from oil storage tanks were collected and transferred to the Uzneftegazinspection Tashkent Control and Chemical Laboratory to determine the quality of petroleum products. A qualitative analysis revealed that 97,703 liters of oil products had been compromised for a total of 514.6 million sums.
Topic: "Uzneftgazinspeksiya" detected a case of embezzlement of natural and liquefied gas worth about 5 billion sums
According to the results of control and analysis, the documents are submitted to law enforcement agencies.
